thread.title: Pharrell Teases More Unseen “Human Race” NMD Heat on Instagram
thread.title_full: Pharrell Teases More Unseen “Human Race” NMD Heat on Instagram

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Pharrell Teases More Unseen “Human Race” NMD Heat on Instagram
text:
After teasing his fandom with these tortilla-hued numbers last month, Pharrell has been snapped on the ‘gram in yet another pair of previously unseen “Human Race” NMDs.
From what we can make out, the sneakers incorporate multicolored Primeknit technology with a white Boost sole and asymmetric “EARTH” and “BODY” text. For further pop, both the laces and EVA midsole plugs arrive in striking yellow. Perpetually fresh, Skateboard P styles the kicks with some ripped jeans and a C.P.F.M sweater .
You know what it is… @hoeldart 
A post shared by Pharrell Williams (@pharrell) on Feb 28, 2017 at 2:43pm PST 

It remains to be seen whether these will officially drop, but don’t hold your breath.
Until then, here’s a recap of Billionaire Boys Club Europe’s SS17 collection.
